One of the primary concerns is the biological impact of prolonged exposure to these high-frequency radiofrequency (RF) electromagnetic fields. The combination of higher frequencies, increased signal density, and advanced transmission methods raises serious questions about the long-term health consequences that may not yet be fully understood.

In short, the health effects of 5G cell towers are not just speculative—they are being observed and reported with increasing frequency.
